job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkelen van componenten voor gebruik van LLM zoals Retrieval Augmented Generation
job_tasks.justification: This phrase directly refers to building components for LLM usage, specifically mentioning Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG), which is a core modeling technique in GenAI.

job_tasks.phrase: ontwikkelen van applicaties en componenten met bijv. Python
job_tasks.justification: This highlights the development of applications and components using a programming language, which falls under traditional software development to build user-facing systems.

job_tasks.phrase: bouwen aan applicaties zoals AchmeaGPT en custom GPT's die door de verschillende merken (zoals Centraal Beheer, Interpolis en Zilveren Kruis) kunnen worden ingezet
job_tasks.justification: This describes the creation of specific applications (AchmeaGPT, custom GPTs) for deployment across various business units, which is a clear software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: automatiseren en versnellen van onze bedrijfsvoering
job_tasks.justification: This phrase indicates the goal of applying Generative AI to improve business operations, demonstrating a need to understand the business context.

job_tasks.phrase: kijken naar verschillende aspecten van het gebruik van LLM zoals data, morele en ethische vraagstukken
job_tasks.justification: This task involves considering not just the technical aspects but also the broader implications (data, moral, ethical) of LLM usage, which requires business and ethical understanding.

soft_skills.phrase: Agile team dat samen focust op maximaal waarde leveren
Door de vele technologische ontwikkelingen zijn er veel opleidingsmogelijkheden, zowel op inhoud als op soft skills. Kennisontwikkeling staat bij ons centraal
informeel en hecht team waarbij collegialiteit erg belangrijk is
informele sessie waarbij peers onderling hun kennis delen

classification.rationale: The job explicitly focuses on developing applications using Large Language Models (LLMs), including Retrieval Augmented Generation (RAG) and custom GPTs. The responsibilities clearly align with building and deploying user-facing software systems powered by generative AI technologies.
